{{Lang|'''Taking Pictures and Recounting Good Times''' ''(unofficial name)''|zh=留影叙佳期|zh_rm=Liúyǐng Xù Jiā Qí}} is a Chinese-exclusive [[Web Event]] celebrating ''Genshin Impact'' characters' birthdays.

==Event Details==
<!--===Duration===
* -->
===Requirements===
* An account UID from one of the ''Genshin Impact'' Chinese servers, and
* An account on [[HoYoLAB]] (China-region)

===Summary===
* Players may select either [[Traveler]], talk to the featured ''Genshin Impact'' character, and take photos with them on their [[birthday]].
